name: packaging glass production, brown | packaging glass, brown | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/1673/documentation

A production site with a sorting capacity of 100 kt per year and a total life span of 50 a is assumed.;Dataset is extrapolated from European data.

From the reception of precursors silica sand, soda, unsorted glass cullets, limestone, dolomite, feldspar, and chemicals  inorganics at the factory gate.

This activity ends with the production of 1 kg of brown packaging glass. The dataset includes material and energy inputs, water consumption, emissions to air and water, waste production and infrastructure.
category: C:Manufacturing/23:Manufacture of other non-metallic mineral products/231:Manufacture of glass and glass products/2310:Manufacture of glass and glass products

processDocumentation.geographyDescription: average European situation, based on information from EU-IPPC BAT document about the glass industry
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: Mix of present used technologies in Europe
processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription: Extrapolated from European data. The uncertainty has been adjusted accordingly.

flow.name: packaging glass, brown
flow.category: C:Manufacturing/23:Manufacture of other non-metallic mineral products/231:Manufacture of glass and glass products/2310:Manufacture of glass and glass products

exchanges.description:
Estimation: reported total amount of energy required per glass melted from literature source. Average european mix of 50% fuel oil and 50% natural gas estimated based on literature source.
EcoSpold01Location=RER
